# Pull Request Checklist

This repo requires **evidence-backed changes** for research-driven updates.

- [ ] I followed /docs/CHANGE_PROPOSAL_TEMPLATE.md
- [ ] Citations included for all non-trivial claims
- [ ] Evaluation plan included (datasets, baselines, metrics)
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Rollback plan included
- [ ] Change is gated (feature flag/config) if risky
